body:
After seeing Tazz's choices for the unofficial all star game I thought I would make this to get a rough idea of who you think is the all star from each of Avicus' main teams. This does not need to be completely based around their public play on Avicus.

Basically pick a team (or multiple) and pick the top four players you think are the all stars.

Some of my picks

Fortissimus:
PedroRiwking
ShinyDialga
Elly
Zegita

Bad Copany:
BmB
Juanooo
Upsoar
MLGTino

Cacaclmarin:
AsianPear
Awesomerp
DCRaven
Cacal_Nathbrown
